long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PaperbackProject is a Chrome extension designed to bring a cozy, nostalgic reading experience to your screen. Perfect for book lovers and anyone who misses the feel of reading on “real-paper,” this extension reduces screen glare and creates a calming, unique aesthetic.

Features:

✅Paper Mode: Apply a soft, textured overlay that mimics aged paper for a cozy, eye-friendly reading experience.

✅Customizable Tint: Adjust the tint overlay to your preference, from gentle warm hues to cooler tones, ideal for long reading sessions.

✅Quick Toggle: Easily turn the effect on or off to switch between immersive and standard browsing.
